10.eng-name: The Book of Leading the Prayer (Al-Imamah)

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Hurairah said:"The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) aid: 'When the Iqamah for prayer is said, there is no prayer except the prescribed prayer

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يُكْرَهُ مِنَ الصَّلاَةِ عِنْدَ الإِقَامَةِ
chapter.eng-name: The Disapproval of praying when the iqhmah is said
